html:
Hi all,

I exchanged emails with Hugo last month about a privacy policy I was working on. I invited him, and would like to invite anyone, to review and comment on it: https://tacoapp.com/info/privacy

It's tracked on GitHub so that anyone (especially users) can see changes, comment, and edit it and issue pull requests: https://github.com/tacoapp/privacy-policy. The first non-trivial user-initiated change arrived within a day of release (https://twitter.com/tacoapp/status/356177329644515328).

Feel free to email me comments, reply here, or open a GitHub issue. tacoapp.com has the back story on what the privacy is actually for.

Cheers,

Troy

-- 
troy.yort.com

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
---

subject: comments on Taco's privacy policy
text:
Hi all,

I exchanged emails with Hugo last month about a privacy policy I was
working on. I invited him, and would like to invite anyone, to review and
comment on it: https://tacoapp.com/info/privacy

It's tracked on GitHub so that anyone (especially users) can see changes,
comment, and edit it and issue pull requests:
https://github.com/tacoapp/privacy-policy. The first non-trivial
user-initiated change arrived within a day of release (
https://twitter.com/tacoapp/status/356177329644515328).

Feel free to email me comments, reply here, or open a GitHub issue.
tacoapp.com has the back story on what the privacy is actually for.

Cheers,

Troy

-- 
troy.yort.com

-- 
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
